markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tears of Death](/Equipment.aspx?ID=130)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Virulent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=162" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 553 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 12,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Tears of death are among the most powerful of alchemical poisons, distilled from extracts of five other deadly poisons in just the right ratios.

**Saving Throw** DC 46 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 10 minutes; **Stage 1** 18d6 poison damage and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) (1 round); **Stage 2** 25d6 poison damage and paralyzed (1 minute); **Stage 3** 30d6 poison damage and paralyzed (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Tears of Death
